original_title: Latvietis, par kura galvu izsludināta 150 000 USD liela atlīdzība
overview: A portrait of Lars Vilks, the State Secretary of  his own micro-nation Ladonia, a sculptor and a scandal-maker (as an art form), and professor of art theory. He is the only Swede, and also the only Latvian (by ancestry), with a price of $150 000 on his head. But perhaps he has been under-valued. A look at Ladonia, and at the nemesis of Swedish officialdom.
title: Head for 150 000 USD
